title: Your biological guide to AIDS (TEFC)
creator_credit: Caroline Godley, Alison Tucker, Vic Lockwood and BBC
brief_description: An informative question and answer format about AIDS presented by Mike Smith and Vicki Licorish. Discusses how the virus is transmitted; what it does to the body; how it affects your partner; the immune system; HIV; condom practice and protection. Includes interviews with AIDS sufferers.
